page.title: 05A DAY IN AN OFFICE
page.content: We interviewed Mr.X who works in a solicitor's office locally. Mr.X's office is about 15 minutes' walk from home. He works from 9.15 am to 5.15 pm. Most of his work consists of typing, shorthand, dictaphone work, and making telephone calls. He enjoys his work and finds it interesting bec- ause he deals with people, helping them with their problems, and each day' the work varies tremendously. With him in the office are one partner, two part-time secretaries, a clerk, and a cashier who comes in once a month. The office equipment includes a photocopier, manual typewriter, and a private telephone exchange. It appears to be quite a small office as most offices these days use computers and wordprocessors, or at least electronic typewriters.
